title: The Traitorous Prince - Novel Updates
tags: Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Empires   Fantasy World   Hated Protagonist   Kingdoms   Knights   Leadership   Male Protagonist   Prison   Psychopaths   Royalty   Sister Complex   Strategic Battles   Strategist   Wars
author: 류은가람
description:
The Traitorous Prince who betrayed his country!

He returned from the abyss at the call of his homeland burning under foreign invasions.

The Traitorous Prince confronted the world’s strongest men with only one demonic strategy: rebel against the world to get this country back into his hands again!>
